com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.prize.service.impl

类 DefaultTaxService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.prize.service.impl.DefaultTaxService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TaxService

    public class DefaultTaxService
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaxService
    A default implementation to support both tax policies: fixed amount and percentage. As the algorithm isn't complicated, only one implementing class to handle all.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明
      DefaultTaxService()

    • 方法详细资料

      • tax

        public java.math.BigDecimal tax(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                       java.lang.String gameId)
        从接口复制的说明: TaxService
        Calculate tax upon the given amount and tax policy.
        指定者:
        tax 在接口中 TaxService
        参数:
        amount - The given amount will be calculate tax upon.
        gameId - The identify of game. Different game may require different tax policy.
        返回:
        the final tax after calculating.
        另请参阅:
        TaxService.tax(BigDecimal, String)

      • VatAndLevyTax

        public java.math.BigDecimal VatAndLevyTax(java.math.BigDecimal inputAmount,
                                 java.lang.String taxPolicyId)
        Calculate tax upon the given amount and tax policy(only vat and levy).
        指定者:
        VatAndLevyTax 在接口中 TaxService
        参数:
        inputAmount - The given amount will be calculate tax upon.
        taxPolicyId - Represents the tax policy: fixed amount of percentage.
        返回:
        the final tax after calculating.

      • calculateVatAndLevy

        protected java.math.BigDecimal calculateVatAndLevy(java.math.BigDecimal inputAmount,
                                       TaxThreshold taxThreshold)
        calculate the tax based on give policy and amount.
        参数:
        inputAmount - The give amount need to calculate tax.
        taxThreshold - The tax threshold.
        返回:
        the final tax after calculating.
